text: Kung Fu Panda: Secrets of the Furious Five is an Annie Award-winning American animated short. It was made by DreamWorks Animation. The movie is a semi- sequel (or spin-off) to the animated movie Kung Fu Panda. It is a part of the original movie's deluxe DVD release. It was later broadcast on NBC on February 26, 2009. The short is now available as a separate DVD as of March 24, 2009. Also, ever since it was released, the short received positive reviews and won the Annie Award for best animated short. ==Other websites== * Kung Fu Panda - Official Website * Category:Animated movies Category:2008 movies Category:English-language movies Category:Annie Award winners Category:Kung Fu Panda Category:Movies about animals Category:Movies set in forests Category:Movies set in China Category:Movies composed by Hans Zimmer Category:DreamWorks Animation movies
title: Secrets of the Furious Five
